snippet: A tightknit clan, the Cordis family has had to go through a death, evictions, a sexual assault and a mental breakdown.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Cordis family pay transportation costs and school fees.
lead_paragraph: A tightknit clan, the Cordis family has had to go through a death, evictions, a sexual assault and a mental breakdown.

headline.print_headline: Enduring a Ceaseless List of Heartbreak, Together
headline.seo: Together, a Family Endures Assault, Evictions and Heartbreak
